thread.title: Xenoblade Chronicles 2 Announced for Nintendo Switch
thread.title_full: Xenoblade Chronicles 2 Announced for Nintendo Switch

author: Alex Osborn
title: Xenoblade Chronicles 2 Announced for Nintendo Switch
text:
During tonight's Nintendo Switch presentation, MonolithSoft unveiled Xenoblade Chronicles 2 for Nintendo's upcoming console. 
No release date for the Xenoblade sequel was provided. Check out the announcement trailer below. 
During the event, Nintendo also announced the price and release date of Switch. The console will release worldwide on March 3, 2017 for $299.99 USD and 29,980 yen. Nintendo confirmed Switch will be region-free , and also shared details about the console's online service and battery life . 
Continue readingâ€¦
